text: Raymond or Ray Clark may refer to: *Ossie Clark (1942–1996), British fashion designer *Raymond Clark (canoeist) (1924–1990), American canoer who competed in the late 1940s *Raymond Clark (engineer), British engineer *Raymond J. Clark III, convicted for the murder of Annie Le *Ray R. Clark (1877–1926), American politician *Yodelin' Slim Clark (1917–2000), American singer *Ray Clark (Paralympic athlete), gold medalist in athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics and again in 1976 ==See also== *Ray Clarke (born 1952), English footballer *Ray Clarke (Australian footballer) (1908–1971), Australian rules footballer
title: Raymond Clark
